title: Plastic Man vs. Superman : r/whowouldwin - Reddit
body: Plastic Man vs. Superman. Plastic Man is pretty pissed that his son was locked up by the Justice League, and vows to take revenge on their leader: Superman. RD:1 No prep time, fight takes place in Metropolis. RD:2 Superman gets a day of prep time. Bonus Round: Plastic Man takes on the rest of the Justice League all at once, can he come out on ...
readable_content:
- [deleted]
  - Plas loses.
  - A League of Assassines member with a freeze gun fucked him up. Superman has the means to freeze him.
  - Superman 10/10 all rounds.

- [deleted]
  - Superman's freeze breath will accomplish the same thing
  - (Link to an image)

- smileimhigh
  - I'm gonna go with Plasticman all rounds.
  - He's basically indestructible, has some truly vicious attacks, and Injustice Supes who is more viscous and no less powerful than regular Supes feared him. Plasticman stared down the whole Regime Sinestro included, and they didn't fuck with him I think that's enough to show just how powerful he is.

- Mindofthelion
  - I assume we're talking about the DC version of Mr Fantastic here?
  - I'm pretty sure Superman stomps all of this.
